name: Asuka 120% Special BURNING Fest.
description: Asuka 120% Special: Burning Fest. Special (あすか１２０％スペシャル　ＢＵＲＮＩＮＧ　Ｆｅｓｔ．　Ｓｐｅｃｉａｌ) is a Fighting video game published by Family Soft released on March 29th, 1996 for the Sony PlayStation.. The franchise was programmed and designed by Masatoshi Imaizumi, its music was composed by Keishi Yonao, and the games' illustrations were designed by Aoi Nanase. Categorized as a bishōjo game, eleven versions were released for various platforms between 1994 and 2002.
